span.span: As you know Covid-19 has affected us all in some sort of way. Due to the ripple effects of all of this, the blood supply is extremely low. Do you want to help and donate blood during this critical time? We hope to get a lot of HS and community donors to continue our tradition of giving and helping. The BRF HS FCCLA has been approved to hold one last Blood Drive this year.

div.span: The Red Cross has and will take a lot of steps to keep everyone healthy and safe during the blood drive.
If interested in donating please go to the Red Cross app or Red Cross website and sign-up or e-mail Bailey Backaus or Madison Eberhardt.

p.a: We have a reputation of excellence that helps attract and retain highly qualified staff. We value and appreciate employees who apply their skills and experience to meeting our high expectations and fulfilling our district's vision.

p.a: We ensure efficient, innovative, and effective use of district resources to promote collaboration and inspire excellence in teaching and learning.

div.div: As a part of the Districts' Strategic Planning process, we are seeking widespread feedback from our entire community, not just the students and families that we work most closely with.
